title: Enhancing Instructional Design Efficiency Through Artificial Intelligence: A Systems Thinking-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital tools and understanding of foundational instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on integrating practical AI tools that professionals can apply to improve work environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze AI tool-integrated instructional design processes using a systems thinking framework.
Learners improve content production efficiency by 30%+ using three AI tools: ChatGPT, Midjourney, and Descript.
Learners can identify ethical issues that may arise when using AI and propose solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
